channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1769; 10:39PM; 22521 W Styles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44NjTzc; #WoodlandHills; Firefighters arrived to find heavy fire showing from an attached garage, and made an aggressive attack, working from the uninvolved to the involved portion of the structure with hose lines, and confined the damage to the garage only. Crews skillfully prevented the flames from entering the living space of the home, or the attic, extinguishing the fire in 22 minutes (30 firefighters). Occupants escaped, but one animal was still frightened inside, but firefighters found the beloved pet and brought it out unharmed. One person was evaluated with a minor medical complaint, but did not need to be transported to the hospital. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E106 E290 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA105 RA72 T105 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1769; 10:17PM; 22521 W Styles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44NjTzc; #WoodlandHills; Heavy fire showing from a two-story single-family home. All occupants (and pet) are reported to be out of the building already. Offensive mode.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA105 RA72 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0973; 02:02PM; 7099 Woodstone Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44zlKrv; #WestHills; Firefighters responded to reports of hikers in distress, in the Bell Canyon Area. Two males and three females were located in a remote area. Firefighters made contact with the group, by both ground and air, to assess their needs. Two females were hoisted and transported by air to a local hospital (both in *at least* serious condition). The other three hikers were escorted back down the trail by firefighters on the ground to be evaluated as a precaution, but found to have only mild (or no) symptoms and did not need hospital transport. Nothing further.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC17 E106 E305 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA105 RA106 RH114 T105; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Long Fall (Fatality); INC#0802; 12:10PM; 5400 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44UO8UP; #ValleyVillage; One adult male patient plummeted approximately 50 feet from a bridge (jumped? fell?) down to the bottom of a dry riverbed, where sadly, he was found to be deceased. Firefighters remain on scene to assist any needs for LAPD and the Medical Examiner, who will be taking over the scene. LAPD Inc # 1933. Nothing further.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E102 E109 E260 RA99 T60; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0487; 09:15AM; 4946 N Llano Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kbdmqa; #WoodlandHills; LAFD firefighters arrived at a two-story home and located fire on the second floor. Two elderly occupants evacuated themselves from the structure after smelling smoke coming from the floor above (thankfully, there was no injury or medical assistance required). It took the first 18 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames. Firefighters confined the fire to the room-of-origin, preventing it from spreading to the attic or ground floor. The cause was determined to be an electrical malfunction. Red Cross has been notified to assist the two displaced residents.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E106 E239 E293 E72 E84 E93 RA72 RA84 T39 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0487; 08:56AM; 4946 N Llano Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kbdmqa; #WoodlandHills; Two-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E239 E293 E72 E84 E93 RA72 RA84 T39 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Vehicle Into Building; INC#1110; 03:10PM; 12731 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44yZMFc; Valley Glen; Preliminary report of a vehicle that was backing out of a parking spot went into an apartment unit, approximately 3/4 through. There are no reported injuries and no one trapped. Most resources are being released but Urban Search and Rescue 88 is continuing through to evaluate what is needed to safely remove the vehicle from the building. LAPD Inc# 2685. Any further media questions are referred to LAPD for the investigation. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E39 E89 EM12 HR3 RA102 RA77 T39 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1039; 02:54PM; 1598 Bienveneda Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/43AnQ9r; Pacific Palisades; LAFD Air Ops located the 80 yo male hiker in moderate medical distress (no trauma). They are preparing for a hoist operation with transport to the hospital. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:28PM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP23 E23 E269 E69 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 RA23 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/20/2023 INC#0544

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0544; 10:23AM; 10000 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gfiEoB; Sun Valley; Firefighters quickly deployed handlines stopped all forward progress of the fire, holding it to approximately two acres. There are no injuries reported. LAFD and LACoFD are in Unified Command and the incident will scale down with some resources remaining to mop up any hot spots. No structures were threatened or damaged. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 CW3A CW3B E24 E289 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E90 E98 EM15 FR91 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 HE1 RA898 T89 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0544; 09:46AM; 10000 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gfiEoB; Sun Valley; Approximately 1/2 acre of light fuels (grass/light brush) burning under zero wind and there are no structures threatened.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 CW3A CW3B E24 E289 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E90 E98 EM15 FR91 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 HE1 RA898 T89 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
